name: IFGExtractableResourceInterface
comment: Interface for all mineable resource objects ( Resource Nodes, Water Volumes )

methods.name: SetIsOccupied
methods.comment: Notify that a miner / pump has claimed this resource object

methods.name: IsOccupied
methods.comment: Does another miner / pump occupy this extractable resource?

methods.name: CanBecomeOccupied
methods.comment: Should this resource node become occupied when an extractor is built upon it? Return false for resources that can hold many extractors

methods.name: HasAnyResources
methods.comment: Is there anything left to mine?

methods.name: GetResourceClass
methods.comment: Gets the descriptor for the resource being mined from this object

methods.name: ExtractResource
methods.comment:
@param amount - quantity to attempt to mine
@return - Actual amount that was able to be mined

methods.name: GetExtractionSpeedMultiplier
methods.comment: Speed modifier for rate at which this resource is extracted

methods.name: GetPlacementLocation
methods.comment: Used by holograms to get the correct location for snapping when placed on this extractable resource

methods.name: CanPlaceResourceExtractor
methods.comment: Can an extractor be placed on this resource object?
